About Me

Hi! I am Nishant Prabhu ,
I am an undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Technology, Madras. I’m currently pursuing a Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering and Masters degree in Data Science. I am extremely passionate about artificial intelligence and I spend a lot of time working on cool projects involving deep learning and reinforcement learning. Visit my blog and projects page to check out my work, and maybe try them out yourself too!

Project Member, Analytics Club, IIT Madras

May 2020 — present

We're bringing together generative networks, reinforcement learning and bayesian optimization to develop a model that can predict stock prices with considerably low error

Deep Learning Summer Intern, Continental Automotives

May 2019 — July 2019

Developed a computer vision based unsupervised learning pipeline for automated driver assistance systems (ADAS). The product can identify road signs captured during test runs in various environmental and lighting conditions

Intern, Digital Horizons

May 2020 — June 2020

Standing in long checkout queues in retail stores can be frustrating. In this project, I co-developed a computer vision tool automatically identify products from their images using spectral features, i.e. packaging color patterns.
